    Check AMS-II.D energy efficiency criteria

    check_applicability_energy_efficiency.Rd

    AMS-II.D requires that project equipment delivers measurable energy savings relative to the baseline.

    check_applicability_energy_efficiency(
  baseline_data,
  project_data,
  fuel_col = "baseline_fuel_quantity",
  efficiency_col = "baseline_efficiency",
  project_fuel_col = "project_fuel_quantity",
  project_efficiency_col = "project_efficiency",
  tolerance = 0.1
)

    Arguments

    baseline_data

    Tibble containing baseline fuel and efficiency metrics.

    project_data

    Tibble containing project fuel and efficiency metrics.

    fuel_col

    Baseline column storing fuel quantities.

    efficiency_col

    Baseline column storing equipment efficiency.

    project_fuel_col

    Project column storing fuel quantities.

    project_efficiency_col

    Project column storing equipment efficiency.

    tolerance

    Minimum fractional reduction in specific fuel consumption (fuel input per unit of baseline useful energy output) that must be achieved to satisfy the applicability condition.

    Value

    Logical scalar indicating whether the criterion is met.

    Examples

    baseline <- tibble::tibble(baseline_fuel_quantity = 1200, baseline_efficiency = 0.72)
project <- tibble::tibble(project_fuel_quantity = 950, project_efficiency = 0.84)
check_applicability_energy_efficiency(baseline, project)
#> [1] TRUE
